dcterms:creator: S. Gui
X. Li
L. Wang
S. Ji
dcterms:description: GOOD is a comprehensive benchmark that curates diverse graph datasets with various tasks, including single/multi-task graph classification, graph regression, and node classification, focusing on out-of-distribution generalization.
dcterms:title: GOOD

dcterms:creator: Z. Yang
W. Cohen
R. Salakhudinov
dcterms:description: Amazon-Photo is a co-purchasing network where each node represents a product, and edges indicate products frequently purchased together, used for evaluating GNN models.
dcterms:title: Amazon-Photo

dcterms:creator: A. Pareja
G. Domeniconi
J. Chen
T. Ma
T. Suzumura
H. Kanezashi
T. Kaler
T. Schardl
C. Leiserson
dcterms:description: Elliptic is a financial network dataset that records Bitcoin transactions over time, where nodes represent transactions and edges denote payment flows, used for illicit transaction identification.
dcterms:title: Elliptic

dcterms:creator: S. Gui
X. Li
L. Wang
S. Ji
dcterms:description: GOOD-Cora is a citation network dataset where nodes represent scientific publications and edges denote citation links, used for predicting publication types.
dcterms:title: GOOD-Cora

dcterms:creator: S. Gui
X. Li
L. Wang
S. Ji
dcterms:description: GOOD-Twitch is a gamer network dataset where nodes represent gamers and edges denote friendship connections, used for predicting whether a user streams mature content.
dcterms:title: GOOD-Twitch

dcterms:creator: S. Gui
X. Li
L. Wang
S. Ji
dcterms:description: GOOD-CBAS is a synthetic dataset derived from the BA-Shapes dataset, where nodes represent house-like motifs and the task is to predict the role of each node within the graph.
dcterms:title: GOOD-CBAS

dcterms:creator: S. Gui
X. Li
L. Wang
S. Ji
dcterms:description: GOOD-WebKB is a network dataset focusing on university webpages, where nodes represent webpages and edges denote hyperlinks, used for predicting webpage classes.
dcterms:title: GOOD-WebKB
